actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, Treasury Department, Health and Human Services Department.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for coverage of an annual preventive health care checkup under part B of such title, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to cover, under part B (Supplementary Medical Insurance), 100 percent of the reasonable charges for an annual preventive health care checkup. Provides that no deductible shall be applied for such checkup.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for coverage of an annual preventive health care checkup under part B of such title, and for other purposes.
